original_text: Now they had forgotten to bring bread, and they had only one loaf with them in the boat.
korean_text: 제자들이 떡 가져오기를 잊었으매 배에 떡 한 개밖에 그들에게 없더라

sentences.original_text: Now they had forgotten to bring bread
and they had only one loaf with them in the boat
sentences.korean_translation: 배 안에는 그들과 함께 빵 한 덩어리밖에 없었다.
